Name: Mr Masso
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Special ingredient #1 : BACARDÍ Superior infused with sugar cane Special ingredient #2 : Ratafía
Review: "The cocktail is inspired by the life path of Facundo Bacardi, beginning in Sitges, Spain right up until today, representing every period of his life with a different ingredient."
History: Spanish BACARDÍ Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Antonio Naranjo at Essencia Xclusive, Seville, Spain.
Nutrition: One serving of Mr Masso contains 180 calories
Garnish: Sugar cane swizzle stick & star anise.
